summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6270 for the improvement of 7th Ave. South from South Jackson Street to South Main Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91575, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
